long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pomodoro Timer is a Chrome extension that helps you increase your productivity by using the pomodoro technique. The Pomodoro technique involves working in focused intervals (usually 25 minutes) with short breaks (usually 5 minutes) in between. This helps you stay focused and avoid exhaustion.The Pomodoro Timer extension displays a timer in a popup box that counts down from the selected time for the pomodoro interval. When the time is up, a reminder to take a break appears. You can adjust the length of the pomodoro intervals and breaks to your liking. Pomodoro Timer is a simple and useful tool to help you get more done and stay focused on your tasks. It's perfect for students, entrepreneurs and anyone else who wants to increase their productivity.
